basics.name: Steven J Peterson
basics.label: Tech Delivery Lead - Co-Founder
basics.summary: Accomplished business strategist and team builder recognized for consistently delivering both top line and bottom line growth to technology and product organizations. Highly skilled in business development, sales, delivery relationship management, client retention, product management, project management, leading enterprise level continuous improvement initiatives and recruiting, training and mentoring teams.  Specialties: Delivery Partnerships, Account Management, Relationship Management, Business Development, Partnerships, Business Intelligence, Product Management.

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scoresâ„¢ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Mark A. Alberts
references.reference: Steve is an enormous reason our clients remained satisfied at TransitCenter. As Director of Account Management and formerly Director of Client Services, Steve took the lead on our most high profile and revenue generating clients from daily interaction to complex project implementations. He always puts clients and coworkers first by being responsive and exceeding expectations. He has the ability to remain remarkably focused, despite the volume of work he tackles. Coworkers also depend on his keen insight and experience on a daily basis. Above all, Steve is a very personable leader who you can identify with and rally behind. Steve would be an asset to any organization!

references.name: Jonathan Stowe
references.reference: Steve was willing to go the distance to understand and map business process better than anyone else I worked with at Wiley. He is thorough, patient, and intuitively correct. If I were building the perfect team, he would be on it.

references.name: Bill Zobrist
references.reference: Steve is experienced in the combination of understanding both the line of business of publishing and the business processes that the represents. His ability to navigate both the business owner and the systems worlds gives him rare experience that is very valuable in IP management.
